name: PEOPLEPRO FOUNDATION
briefDescription: PeoplePro is a social impact consulting organization working with homegrown and multinational corporates in Asia and Middle East. We work in Education, Business and Retail verticals providing consulting services for Social Emotional Learning (SEL), Corporate Social Responsibility, Social Marketing, Employee Engagement Initiatives and Human Resource Capacity Development with focus on vocational skill development for blue collar and support staff. PeoplePro has begun successfully embarking into the space of CSR with several corporate which has further radiated the reach of the organization into the sub urban - rural foray.
